mapper.select: SELECT p_count_check_id, process_id, check_item, sample, check_number, unqualify, qualify, cdate, measure_data, process_count_check.emp_id, emp_name, result, note FROM process_count_check, employee WHERE process_count_check.emp_id = employee.emp_id

SELECT p_count_check_id, process_id, check_item, sample, check_number, unqualify, qualify, cdate, measure_data, process_count_check.emp_id, emp_name, result, note FROM process_count_check, employee WHERE process_count_check.emp_id = employee.emp_id AND p_count_check_id like CONCAT('%',#{pCountCheckId},'%' )
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM process_count_check WHERE p_count_check_id IN
#{id}

select
distinct
from process_count_check
order by ${orderByClause}
